context_menu_rename_tab.description: context menu item to rename tab

description.description: Note: this cannot be longer than 132 characters
description.message: Provides a simple interface to change tab title, and option to use bookmark name as tab title.

options_title_from_bookmark.message: Use bookmark name as tab title

options_show_in_context_menu.description: Note: $menu$ will be replaced with the label from 'context_menu_rename_tab'

panel_error_msg.description: Error message that will show when trying to rename restricted url
panel_error_msg.message: Renaming tab with the current address is not allowed

panel_permanently_checkbox.message: Rename this tab regardless to its address
